divs: Sighting DetailsMy sister & I saw this. The very light blue streak disappeared as the red glow disappeared. JW & LSC
Summary: large deap red glow. could not see a defined shape. lasted at least 20 + min. in a large area in one spot. it diid decend. still could not see a definite image. very light blue horizontal streak to the east side of it. all this in the southern sky.
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Antioch
